Description:
Model
Brand: Logitech
Name: G815 Lightsync
Model: 920-009087


Keyboard
Keyboard Interface: USB 2.0
Design Style: Slim
Mechanical Keyboard: Yes
Key Switch Type: Clicky
Keyboard Color: Black
Backlit: Yes
Type: Wired


Mouse
Mouse Included: No


OS / System Requirement
Operating System Supported: Windows 7 or later, macOS X 10.11 or later


Features
Features: LIGHTSYNC RGB
Advanced lighting customization and effects from - 16.8 million colors.*

5 Programmable G-Keys
Set up custom game macros and in-app commands, save to onboard memory, and execute them with a single keystroke.*

Dedicated media controls
Utterly refined control featuring volume roller, play, pause, skip and mute.

USB 2.0 Passthrough
Plug in your mouse, flash drive or phone for full power throughput and data speed.

High-performance, low profile key switches
Half the height of standard key switches for unrivaled typing speed and comfort. Available with Clicky Switches for an unmistakable audible click and tactile feedback; Linear for completely smooth keystrokes; Tactile for a discernable bump through actuation.

Aluminum Top Case
Aircraft-grade 5052 aluminum alloy for a sophisticated look that's incredibly strong and durable.

Impossibly thin
Extreme durability in an aesthetically sleek, minimalist design.

Logitech G HUB software
Fully customize and access advanced features and settings. Download and share custom profiles with Logitech G community.

*Advanced features require Logitech G HUB Software.


Package Contents
Package Contents: G815 gaming keyboard
User documentation
